name: Create a Google Docs meeting notes document and a Google Calendar event from a new Calendly event
description:
Use this template to automatically create Google Docs meeting notes and a Calendar event when a job applicant schedules a Calendly event.

The template works with the following [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shruEPIPJZVXf2tAY).

It also works with this Google Docs [meeting notes template](https://docs.google.com/document/d/14IcegmWjHtq7umuXdYv8z5lKCHEe6-rbVOKtRDcmuPU/edit?usp=sharing). {{ }} brackets enfold the text that will be dynamically replaced with Airtable field values.
